# Rules for large language model (LLM) crawlers
# gregstellato.com

# Allow all public pages
Allow: /

# No restricted sections
Disallow:

# Specific LLM user-agents
User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Allow: /

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /

User-agent: FacebookAI
Allow: /

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /
